title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.67 - Joint hearing of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.67 - Joint hearing of proceedings

State Regulations

The Board may, by resolution, direct that two or more
proceedings, arising out of the same or similar set of facts, be heard
together, without consolidation, if no substantial right is
prejudiced. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.67

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
